channel.title: Amphibians on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Amphibians on ZooBerry

item.title: Valentine Pack
item.description: A Valentine-themed pack featuring paths, balloons, a gazebo, animals, and more.

item.title: Golden Dart Frog
item.description: The Golden Dart Frog is a bright yellow tropical amphibian, native to rainforests.

item.title: Alpine Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Blue Poison Dart Frog
item.description: These little frogs are easily recognized by their blue color, which is generally darker on the limbs and belly and overlaid with black spots or patches.

item.title: Red Eyed Tree Frog
item.description: A vibrant tree frog native to Central and South America, known for its bright red eyes.

item.title: Strawberry Dart Frog
item.description: The strawberry poison dart frog is common in the Atlantic lowland tropical forests of Central America.

item.title: Fire-bellied Toad
item.description: Despite the remarkably vivid coloring of its underbelly, the Oriental fire-bellied toad merges perfectly with its surroundings.
